patthana14.13:1.1_0: Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana14.13:1.1_1: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo
patthana14.13:2.1_0: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana14.13:2.1_1: paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca
patthana14.13:3.1_0: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavañca
patthana14.13:3.1_1: noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavañca noāsavañca
patthana14.13:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
